name: Initiative Tracker
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Interface screen: Initiative Tracker, grid-based layout with spacing, icons, meters, controls, fantasy UI (parchment/metal/wood motifs), high contrast, readable, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Typography must be crisp and readable (sans-serif, high contrast, WCAG 4.5:1). Prefer short, real labels (STR, DEX, HP, BAG, MAP) or clean unlabeled slots. Avoid nonsense strings. Ensure 8–24 pt equivalent sizing and consistent alignment., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
revised_prompt: Design a painterly-styled medieval fantasy user interface for a tabletop RPG similar to D&D. Include a grid-based layout with clear spacing, icons, meters, and controls. The overall aesthetic should draw inspiration from aquatic themes, featuring materials and surfaces that suggest an underwater environment, like the look of pressure-dome materials and the glimmers of bioluminescence. Elements of parchment, metal, and wood motifs should be integrated to emphasize the fantasy setting. Colors should stick to a palette of deep ocean blues, teals, sea-greens, enhanced with pearly highlights. Maintain high contrast for readability, employing sans-serif typography at 8–24 pt size for crisp, clear labels (e.g., STR, DEX, HP, BAG, MAP). Stay away from nonsensical symbols or strings, maintaining sense in content and consistency in alignment. Avoid incorporating elements suggestive of sci-fi settings, modern signs, realistic CGI, or anime style, and avoid excessive bloom glare.
